Our History

Bat Blitz Industries was started in the year 1969 by Mr. P.M. Maheta under the inspiration of his father Mr. K.A. Maheta, BB Sports Industries entered in the Indian market with a great hard work and dedication to launch their registered Trade-Mark BB riders in the year 1976. The company started export of cricket bats in 1979 to UK and Australia. BB Sports Industries manufacturers quality cricket equipments for meeting the requirements of national and international markets.

Our Purpose

As our BB Brand Cricket Equipments are known as a name of Quality goods are used by the international cricket players like Saurav Ganguly, Virender Sehwag, Sachin Tendulkar, V.V.S Laxman, Roger Binny, Manoj Prabhakar, and many other test cricketers like S. Ramesh, Yuvraj Singh, Akash Chopra, and Deep Das Gupta. The highest test runs scored by V.V.S. Laxman 281 and now 309 by Virender Sehwag at Multan in Pakistan are by our Cricket Bat SS TON. Our purpose is to serve the best, ALWAYS!

Our Vision

The company has a good share of export business in the world market exporting to Australia, UK, USA, South Africa, Canada, Sri Lanka and Bangladesh. Our company is engaged in making the product for international companies. Our product brands are TON L.E, TON ELITE, TON VA-999, TON HERITAGE, TON CAMBRIDGE. Our Sunridges BB cricket equipment is used by international players like Arvinda DeSilva, Lance Klusner, Alister Cambell, Ravindu Shah, Trevour, Hitesh Modi, Chaminda Vaas, Hassan Tilakratne and many others. Our vision is to grow with a rapid speed.

Thank you for choosing Cricket Bats Store. We look forward to serving you and being a part of your cricketing journey.
